description.en:
What is Swftcoin (SWFTC)?

SwftCoin (SWFTC) powers SWFT Blockchain, the all-in-one cross-chain wallet, exchange, and payments platform powered by Swftcoin (SWFTC) that allows users to swap, pay with and share hundreds of cryptocurrencies. SWFTC provides SWFT Blockchain with the sources of liquidity needed to offer faster cross-chain swaps at the best rates, and with low fees. The extra sources of liquidity that SWFT Blockchain gets from SWFTC's trading pairs on dozens of exchanges give it an advantage over other swap providers.

In addition, SWFTC holders benefit from a 50% discount on fees charged by SWFT Blockchain. This means that SWFTC holders can swap cryptocurrencies across chains with a fee of only 0.1%.

SWFTC is also expected to gain utility as the future governance token for SWFT Blockchain's upcoming DEX aggregator which will combine its years of cryptocurrency swap experience with decentralized, innovative solutions.

After launching as an ERC-20 token on Ethereum, SWFTC is now also live on Binance Smart Chain and Heco.

More about SWFT Blockchain

SWFT Blockchain's cross-chain transfer protocol combines blockchain, machine learning, and big data technologies to enable simpler, faster and safer cryptocurrency transfers. Founded in 2017, SWFT Blockchain received investment from Draper Dragon in 2018 and participated in the first ever batch of the Berkeley Blockchain Xcelerator in 2019. In keeping with its mission to make smart worldwide financial transfers simpler, faster and safer, SWFT Blockchain also partners with wallets like TokenPocket, Huobi Wallet, Ellipal, and other digital asset platforms to integrate its services and help their users swap without leaving their apps.

The SWFT Blockchain app is available on the iOS App Store and on Google Play. The app features one-click swaps between hundreds of currencies across dozens of blockchains, custodial and non-custodial storage options, social payments, red packets, and more.

SWFT Pay allows anybody to send payments in hundreds of cryptocurrencies (including stablecoins) using any social network or messaging platform. SWFT Pay users can also request payments using a link and payment receivers can also choose to enter their preferred address to receive their money.

SWFT Red Packets let users share crypto with up to 5,000 people using a link. All users need to do is select the currency and the amount of it they would like to share, and select how many people they'd like to share it with, and voila. SWFT Blockchain users open red packet filled with free crypto every day.

SwftCoin (SWFTC) powers SWFT Blockchain, the all-in-one cross-chain wallet, exchange, and payments platform powered by Swftcoin (SWFTC) that allows users to swap, pay with and share hundreds of cryptocurrencies. SWFTC provides SWFT Blockchain with the sources of liquidity needed to offer faster cross-chain swaps at the best rates, and with low fees. The extra sources of liquidity that SWFT Blockchain gets from SWFTC's trading pairs on dozens of exchanges give it an advantage over other swap providers.

In addition, SWFTC holders benefit from a 50% discount on fees charged by SWFT Blockchain. This means that SWFTC holders can swap cryptocurrencies across chains with a fee of only 0.1%.

SWFTC is also expected to gain utility as the future governance token for SWFT Blockchain's upcoming DEX aggregator which will combine its years of cryptocurrency swap experience with decentralized, innovative solutions.

After launching as an ERC-20 token on Ethereum, SWFTC is now also live on Binance Smart Chain and Heco.

More about SWFT Blockchain

SWFT Blockchain's cross-chain transfer protocol combines blockchain, machine learning, and big data technologies to enable simpler, faster and safer cryptocurrency transfers. Founded in 2017, SWFT Blockchain received investment from Draper Dragon in 2018 and participated in the first ever batch of the Berkeley Blockchain Xcelerator in 2019. In keeping with its mission to make smart worldwide financial transfers simpler, faster and safer, SWFT Blockchain also partners with wallets like TokenPocket, Huobi Wallet, Ellipal, and other digital asset platforms to integrate its services and help their users swap without leaving their apps.

The SWFT Blockchain app is available on the iOS App Store and on Google Play. The app features one-click swaps between hundreds of currencies across dozens of blockchains, custodial and non-custodial storage options, social payments, red packets, and more.

SWFT Pay allows anybody to send payments in hundreds of cryptocurrencies (including stablecoins) using any social network or messaging platform. SWFT Pay users can also request payments using a link and payment receivers can also choose to enter their preferred address to receive their money.

SWFT Red Packets let users share crypto with up to 5,000 people using a link. All users need to do is select the currency and the amount of it they would like to share, and select how many people they'd like to share it with, and voila. SWFT Blockchain users open red packet filled with free crypto every day.

description.ko:
블록체인간 고속 전송을 위한 거래 플랫폼

모바일 앱, 웹, API를 모두 지원

빅데이터, 인공지능에 블록체인을 결합한 형태로 개발

ERC202) 토큰 기반

전 세계의 글로벌 규모 거래소들과 OTC 시장과 계약을 체결할 계획을 가지고 있으며 이들 간의 연결고리 역할을 수행할 플랫폼으로 목표를 설정해 놓은 상태입니다.

빠르고 쉬운 처리과정과 경제성, 그리고 고품질의 자산 관리 프로그램을 선보일 것이며 본 플랫폼에서 단독적으로 쓰이게 될 통화인 SwftCoin은 기능적으로 비트코인, 라이트코인, 그리고 이더리움의 장점들을 취합해 놓은 형태가 될 것입니다. 

하지만 이와 유사한 서비스를 하는 경쟁 플랫폼들 또한 다수 존재하므로 이에 대한 경쟁력을 갖춰야 할 것으로 보입니다.
